Louisville_Jefferson_County.Louisville Male High School:
Louisville Male Traditional High School is a public secondary school serving students in grades 9 through 12 in the southside of Louisville, Kentucky, USA. It is part of the Jefferson County Public School District.


== History ==


=== Ninth and Chestnut (1856–1897) ===
Founded 162 years ago in 1856, Louisville Male High School became the first high school west of the Allegheny Mountains. Therefore, Male was known originally as "High School." After other high schools were established in the years following, the school was named "Louisville Male High School".
